p: Given the associations with CSA found in this study, addressing CSA may confer benefits for other public health concerns for Black MSM if indeed CSA is a precipitating event for engagement in subsequent drug and sexual risk behaviors or in the case of IPV, challenging the ability of Black MSM CSA survivors to establishing healthier intimate relationships and/or impeding the ability of them to terminate relationships with partners engaging in risky behaviors. Conversely, interventions for HIV risk reduction [ 27], compulsive sex (which may foster sexual risk behavior) [ 11, 28, 29], and/or substance misuse [ 11] among Black MSM may also benefit by directly recognizing and addressing CSA.
